level.heading: ASSESSMENT AND REFERRAL FOR INDIVIDUAL ADULTS IN TEMPORARY SHELTER (ยง 29-2506)

level.text: Individuals receiving temporary shelter services for individual adults shall be provided assessment and case management services with an appropriately trained, qualified, and supervised case manager.
Individuals residing in temporary shelters shall participate in the assessment and case management services provided.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 470, 479 (January 24, 1992); as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 6438 (July 23, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice Emergency Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 11353 (November 26, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 3007 (April 8, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 7442, 7446 (August 19, 2011).
